arts.sum: Jan Schöppner (30'), Luca Kerber (61'), and Léo Scienza (90'+5) responded for Heidenheim, who showed remarkable resilience to equalise three times. Marvin Ducksch fires home past Kevin Müller to restore Werder Bremen's lead in the second half - IMAGO/nordphoto GmbH / Kokenge

arts.ttl: 20:30 kick offs: Leipzig implosion, late madness in Bremen, Union Berlin and Hoffenheim beaten comfortably
arts.sum: On a hectic night across the Bundesliga, a resurgent Stuttgart overcame a Leipzig side imploding from the inside, Heidenheim rescued a point in a moment of madness at Weserstadion, whilst Bayern München and Augsburg comfortably saw off Hoffenheim and Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Heidenheim preview: Hosts look to bounce back
arts.sum: Heidenheim currently occupy the relegation playoff position in the Bundesliga standings as they prepare for their midweek clash against mid-table Werder Bremen at the Weserstadion on Wednesday in gameweek 17.

After losing six in a row, Heidenheim started 2025 with a solid home win, but still sit third from bottom. Four-time Bundesliga champions Bremen have won only twice at home, compared to five wins on ...
